headline.main: HOUSE 'PERMITS' FISH TO TESTIFY; He Is 'Authorized' to Appear Before Grand Jury When Congress Is Idle

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 17 -- The House "authorized" Representative Hamilton Fish of New York today to testify before the District of Columbia grand jury at such time as the House was not in session. There was little discussion preceding the vote, in which only a few "noes" were heard.
